formattedAddress: 253 W 14th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 253 W 14th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I am a parent of twins who have never been exposed to group settings or school at all (thanks to covid) but Bright Horizons on W14th st have really impressed me with their approach. The staff is motivated and dedicated to provide the best care to our children. My kids started 3-k & went from hating school to wanting to be there on the weekends. I recommend this school to anyone in the area. We walk 30 min home just to be a part of this great community. They offer after care and are very involved in day to day activities with the children. I’ve never felt this sense of security and safety for my children. The facility is very easy to communicate with, they understand the needs of every child may be different and are  constantly making efforts to adapt with every case presented. I recommend them 10/10! Check them out.

originalText.text: Bright Horizons at West 14th has been a wonderful back-up care environment for our 2-month old daughter for the last few weeks! Ms. Denise, her primary teacher, has a wonderful way with young children and is warm, thoughtful, and really engaged in our daughter’s comfort and growth. The entire staff has been very welcoming, professional, and a joy to work with. The center is bright, clean, and filled with everything needed to provide outstanding care and loads of developmental stimulation. I have used Bright Horizons for back up care for 9 years and am always extremely happy with the people and the care they offer and our experience here only reinforces this feeling.

originalText.text: My preschool children have been in backup care at BH west 14th this month and I am so impressed by this center!  We have been to several different BH locations around this city and this is the best one I’ve seen. the teachers here are exceptionally loving and I really enjoy watching them engage with my children.  The classrooms are big and beautiful, and the whole place is really well run.  They take the kids out to walk or to the playground every day which I love, not all the city BH centers are able to do that.  Special shout out to Miss Rachel and Miss Krystal, my children have been having a great time with them!

originalText.text: We LOVE bright horizons. Our daughter just moved from infant room (with the wonderful Ms Denise!!!) to toddler room. Ms Denise is amazing with children and parents, so communicative and great at sending pictures/videos. Will truly miss her !

text.text: We LOVE bright horizons. Our daughter just moved from infant room (with the wonderful Ms Denise!!!) to toddler room. Ms Denise is amazing with children and parents, so communicative and great at sending pictures/videos. Will truly miss her !

originalText.text: Absolutely a gem! The teachers and program leadership are very responsive to students interests and needs. I love how open and easy parent communication goes and also how quickly they take action based on feedback. My son absolutely loves it, leaves with a smile on his face always and talks about school so much. The only thing we wish for is outdoor space for playing during recess. They try the best that they can and do so much with daily neighborhood walks for the kids but I hope that a permit or something can come through soon so that the kids get to play outdoors :)
